flavor_text_entries.red:
When the bulb on
its back grows
large, it appears to lose the
ability to stand
on its hind legs.
flavor_text_entries.blue:
When the bulb on
its back grows
large, it appears to lose the
ability to stand
on its hind legs.
flavor_text_entries.yellow:
The bulb on its
back grows by
drawing energy. It gives off an
aroma when it is
ready to bloom.
flavor_text_entries.gold:
Exposure to sun­
light adds to its
strength. Sunlight also makes the bud
on its back grow
larger.
flavor_text_entries.silver:
If the bud on its
back starts to
smell sweet, it is evidence that
the large flower
will soon bloom.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
The bulb on its
back grows as it
absorbs nutrients. The bulb gives off
a pleasant aroma
when it blooms.
flavor_text_entries.ruby:
There is a bud on this POKéMON’s back.
To support its weight, IVYSAUR’s legs
and trunk grow thick and strong. If it starts spending more time lying
in the sunlight, it’s a sign that the
bud will bloom into a large flower soon.
flavor_text_entries.sapphire:
There is a bud on this POKéMON’s back.
To support its weight, IVYSAUR’s legs
and trunk grow thick and strong. If it starts spending more time lying
in the sunlight, it’s a sign that the
bud will bloom into a large flower soon.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
To support its bulb, IVYSAUR’s legs
grow sturdy. If it spends more time lying in
the sunlight, the bud will soon bloom into
a large flower.
flavor_text_entries.firered:
There is a plant bulb on its back.
When it absorbs nutrients, the bulb is said
to blossom into a large flower.
flavor_text_entries.leafgreen:
When the bulb on its back grows large, it
appears to lose the ability to stand on
its hind legs.
flavor_text_entries.diamond:
When the bud on its back starts
swelling, a sweet aroma wafts to
indicate the flower’s coming bloom.

When the bud on its back starts
swelling, a sweet aroma wafts to
indicate the flower’s coming bloom.

When the bud on its back starts

indicate the flower’s coming bloom.

If the bud on its back starts to

flavor_text_entries.x:
There is a plant bulb on its back.
When it absorbs nutrients, the bulb is said to
blossom into a large flower.
flavor_text_entries.y:
When the bud on its back starts swelling, a sweet
aroma wafts to indicate the flower’s coming bloom.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
There is a bud on this Pokémon’s back. To support its weight,
Ivysaur’s legs and trunk grow thick and strong.
If it starts spending more time lying in the sunlight,
it’s a sign that the bud will bloom into a large flower soon.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
There is a bud on this Pokémon’s back. To support its weight,
Ivysaur’s legs and trunk grow thick and strong.
If it starts spending more time lying in the sunlight,
it’s a sign that the bud will bloom into a large flower soon.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu:

flavor_text_entries.shield:
Exposure to sunlight adds to its strength.
Sunlight also makes the bud on its back
grow larger.
